vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.17;
son of: Asher (H0836);
brother of: Imnah (H3232), Ishvi (H3440), Beriah (H1283) and Serah (H8294)
§ Ishuai or Isuah = "he will resemble"
the 2nd son of Asher
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亦施瓦 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他相像"
亞設的兒子 (創46:17; 代上 7:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亦施瓦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他相像"
亚设的儿子 (创46:17; 代上 7:30)
